data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Oklahoma who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oklahoma, United States
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Oklahoma.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Oklahoma, United States. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Oklahoma, United States to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,914,830 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Mongolian, Peripheral people.
Father, let the threatened of Oklahoma, United States know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Oklahoma, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the state of Oklahoma, United States has a population of 3,960,700.

We estimate Oklahoma has 1,045,870 people who might know Jesus, 1,983,705 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 931,125 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Oklahoma, United States.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
